boat.full_description: Idler is pitch pine on oak frames, both sawn and steamed, with an iron ballast keel. She did have a retrofitted Yanmar 10hp however this is not currently present. In 2021 she is undergoing full restoration in Scotland. By her owner N Smith. (Bothan Boats).
boat.name: Idler
boat.short_description: 22ft long keel Gaff Cutter built by W. (Walter?) Wiggins in Gt Wakering in 1940.
